id: Portion of the Notion Athlete OS
name: Portion of the Notion Athlete OS
description: Athlete OS - become the best version of yourselfAthlete OS is the Notion template that allows you to work out effectively. It supports you on your fitness journey like no other application can.Athlete OS got you covered ! Need exercises for a specific muscle group ? We have over 45 different ones. Need a place to organize articles , podcasts and videos ? Not a problem. Need a place to list your goals, a place to journal , to find cooking recipes and a place to stay motivated ? Athlete OS does ex
features: Exercises section ( 45 + exercises neatly organized into categories including  Leg, Athletic, Arm and Chest Exercises; Resources section ( organize everyting into Notebooks and Notes ); Journal + Habit Tracker ( write your thoughts ); 50% discount for the whole Notion Template
